title: 【新人奖第五季】★Minecraft★[迟慕出品]《天域群岛》Ep.4
author: 迟慕i
txt_content: 大家好，我是迟慕。今天给大家继续带来天域群岛生存。以下是地图作者的MCBBS网址：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=312934&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D8%26searchoption%5B171%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B3%5D%3D3%26searchoption%5B171%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox迟慕的优酷：http://i.youku.com/chimuichimui

replies.txt_content: 你应该把视频放在贴内
